content: 9 sl in 2nd chain from hook sl 6 single_crochet* 11 5 single_crochet ear single_crochet color d horn slip_stitch in same st color a 4 single_crochet color d horn slip_stitch in same st color a single_crochet ear 3 single_crochet 12 single_crochet in each st around work around the ears and horns place the eyes between rounds 7 and 8 the eyes will be 4 holes apart the eyes will line up over the bobble stitches in round 3 13 decrease 2 single_crochet x 3 decrease= 10 stuff the dragon as you work 14-64 single_crochet in each st around now to get the twisty look you will take some jewelry wire cut a piece approximately 24 inches in length fold it in half and twist it insert it into the dragon you will want to work around it as you continue here is a general video on how to insert wire https //www youtube com/watch v=uvdsn3g7kji&t=3s 65 decrease 3 single_crochet x 2= 8 66-83 single_crochet in each st around 84 decrease 6 single_crochet= 7 85-90 single_crochet in each st around 91 decrease 5 single_crochet= 6 92-95 single_crochet in each st around 96 decrease single_crochet x 2= 4 f/o and sew the hole closed sweet oddity art 3 belly with color b chain 64 leg 1 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook and across slip_stitch in next chain single_crochet in remaining chains f/o and leave an extra long tail for sewing legs make 4 starting with color e 1 make 4 single_crochet into a magic_ring= 4 2 blo single_crochet chain 4 half_double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and across x 4 *mark all your single_crochet you worked for help in round 3* sweet oddity art 4 legs continued *in round 3 you will work in the stitches you marked* 3-4 single_crochet in each st around 5 single_crochet increase x 2= 6 change to color a 6-7 single_crochet in each st around do not stuff the legs 8 2 single_crochet increase x 2= 8 9 single_crochet in each st around single_crochet the opening closed f/o and leave a long tail for sewing sweet oddity art 5 spikes with color c chain 63 1 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook 4 single_crochet chain 3 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in next chain work 3 single_crochet in the base chain across f/o and leave an extra long tail for sewing sweet oddity art 6 assembly belly 1 pin the belly to the bottom of the body 2 sew the belly onto the body spikes 1 pin the spikes onto the top of the body 2 sew the spikes onto the body sweet oddity art 7 legs 1 pin the legs onto the sides of the body 2 sew the legs onto the body you have your finished dragon thank you for your purchase if you have any questions or concerns please email me at sweetoddityart@gmail com or etsy convo me i will get back to you asap please share your finished dragon with
